languages.text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Requires: Imperialis — Zealot The wielder can not fail any Willpower or Toughness tests while in combat. Base armour property: +15% armour if the wielder's Toughness is more than 70.
Requires Imperialis — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any Willpower or Toughness tests while in combat. Base armour property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

languages.text: Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Fanático El portador no puede fallar {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} durante el combate. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}: +15 % de armadura si la Resistencia del usuario es superior a 70.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Necesita Imperialis: Fanático El portador no puede fallar {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} durante el combate. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}: +15 % de armadura si la Resistencia del usuario es superior a 70.

languages.text: 需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——狂热者 装备者在战斗时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}都绝对不会失败。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：如果装备者的坚韧高于70，获得+15%护甲。
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: 需要信念“帝国主义——狂热者”。 装备者在战斗时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}都会失败。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：如果装备者的坚韧高于70，获得+15%护甲。

languages.text: Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Zélote. L'utilisateur ne peut pas échouer aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} ou d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} tant qu'il est au combat. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +15 % d'armure si l'Endurance de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Requiert Imperialis — Zélote. L'utilisateur ne peut pas échouer aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} tant qu'il est au combat. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +15 % d'armure si la Résistance de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.

languages.text: Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Eiferer Der Träger kann bei keiner {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} scheitern, während er sich im Kampf befindet. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +15 % Rüstung, falls die Zähigkeit des Trägers höher als 70 ist.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Erfordert Imperialis — Eiferer Der Träger kann bei keiner {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} scheitern, während er sich im Kampf befindet. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +15 % Rüstung, falls die Zähigkeit des Träger höher als 70 ist.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要 使用者は戦闘中、いかなる{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}にも失敗しない。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者の耐久力が70以上の場合、アーマー +15%
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: 帝国 ― 狂信者が必要 使用者は戦闘中、いかなる{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}にも失敗できない。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者の耐久力が70以上の場合、アーマー +15%。

languages.text: Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — апологет Персонаж успешно проходит любые {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} в бою. Базовое свойство: +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, если значение Выносливости больше 70.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Требуется: Империум — фанатик Персонаж успешно проходит любые {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} в бою. Базовое свойство: +15% к броне, если значение Выносливости больше 70.
